imageScripts.runScript:
echo "Mock!"


    echo "SecondMock!"
    echo "Arguments received: $*" # This is a very long comment
    exec echo "$@"

buildScripts.setup:
touch ${SINGULARITY_ROOTFS}/mock.txt
    touch mock.txt

    touch ${SINGULARITY_ROOTFS}/secondmock.txt
    touch secondmock.txt
buildScripts.post:
echo 'this is a command so long that the user had to' \
    'add a new line'
    echo 'export GOPATH=$HOME/go' >> $SINGULARITY_ENVIRONMENT

    echo 'this is a command so long that the user had to' \
    'add a new line again'
    echo 'export GOPATH=$HOME/go' >> $SINGULARITY_ENVIRONMENT
